title: Vladislav Oslonovsky
text:
Vladislav Dmitriyevich Oslonovsky (; born 15 January 1995) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He plays for <a href="FC%20Nosta%20Novotroitsk">Nosta Novotroitsk</a>.
Club career.
He started playing in the youth teams of Portuguese club <a href="S.L.%20Benfica">Benfica</a> and Russian <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Moscow">Spartak Moscow</a>.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> for <a href="FC%20Volga%20Ulyanovsk">Volga Ulyanovsk</a> on 21 April 2013 in a game against <a href="FC%20Oktan%20Perm">Oktan Perm</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Shinnik%20Yaroslavl">FC Shinnik Yaroslavl</a> on 11 July 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Baltika%20Kaliningrad">FC Baltika Kaliningrad</a>.
